summary: While King Richard is away at the Crusades, some Nottingham nobles and their Sheriff plot to confiscate estates of fallen Crusaders but Robin Hood and Maid Marian foil their plan.
cast: Richard Greene|Peter Cushing|Niall MacGinnis|Richard Pasco|Jack Gwillim|Sarah Branch|Nigel Green|Vanda Godsell|Edwin Richfield|Charles Lamb|Dennis Lotis|Jack Cooper|Patrick Crean|Barry De Boulay|John Franklyn|Aiden Grennell|Maureen Halligan|Reginald Hearne|John Hoey|Adam Keane|Desmond Llewelyn|Anew McMaster|Derren Nesbitt|James Neylin|Brian Rawlinson|Oliver Reed|Paddy Ryan
keywords: psychotronic film|robin hood character|maid marian character|sheriff of nottingham character|shot in the chest
title: La espada del bosque de Sherwood
